consensus_report.justification: Assigned to Aarav. Strong match with primary skills (React, Tailwind). Aarav is fast at UI, so TCF is lower. Advanced AI tooling provides significant efficiency.

Assigned to Priya. Strong match with primary skills (Node.js, PostgreSQL). Priya is thorough, which slightly increases TCF, but her core competency is high. Intermediate AI tooling provides moderate efficiency.
Original story FE-002 (10h) split due to exceeding 8-hour atomic task limit. This sub-task focuses on basic UI for login, a strength for Aarav. TCF reflects UI speed, AEF reflects advanced AI use.

Original story FE-002 (10h) split. This sub-task focuses on complex state management and authentication logic, an area where Aarav struggles. TCF is significantly increased to account for learning and potential rework. Advanced AI tooling helps mitigate some, but not all, of the complexity risk.

Assigned to Priya. Strong match with primary skills (Node.js, PostgreSQL). Priya's thoroughness slightly increases TCF, but her core competency is high. Intermediate AI tooling provides moderate efficiency.
Assigned to Aarav. Strong match with primary skills (React, Tailwind). Aarav is fast at UI, so TCF is lower. Advanced AI tooling provides significant efficiency.
